title: why i can't subcriber message from mqtt

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

```
Incoming packet MqttPublishMessage[fixedHeader=MqttFixedHeader[messageType=PUBLISH, isDup=false, qosLevel=AT_LEAST_ONCE, isRetain=false, remainingLength=46], variableHeader=MqttPublishVariableHeader[topicName=cpcms-close-chute, packetId=3], payload=PooledSlicedByteBuf(ridx: 0, widx: 25, cap: 25/25, unwrapped: PooledUnsafeDirectByteBuf(ridx: 48, widx: 48, cap: 512))]
```
```
mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.connector=smallrye-mqtt
mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.host=103.1.209.199
mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.port=8005
mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.topic=cpcms-close-chute
#mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.auto-generated-client-id=true
mp.messaging.incoming.counter-read-EVTP.qos=1
```
```
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
                <artifactId>quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging-mqtt</artifactId>
                <version>${version.quarkus}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
                <artifactId>quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging</artifactId>
                <version>${version.quarkus}</version>
            </dependency>
```
when i send a message into topic but I can't subcriber message from mqtt. App just log as i described above.
